name: Len'en Fangame ~ The Little Secret Between Us: The Agreement (1/8)
name_original: Len'en Fangame ~ The Little Secret Between Us: The Agreement (1/8)
description:
Thank you for playing my game!

---Buttons:
Move: Arrows
Shoot: X
Focus: Z
Bomb: C
Change Character: SPACE BAR
Change Shoot Type: V

---Save:

The save function does not work on this website, but you can still play the whole game!
